original_title: ギャル番外地２　またシメさせてもらいます
overview: This work is the second installment of the sequel to "Gal Bangaichi Shime Shimeshimasu" (2019), and is an erotic drama with elements of the SF version of Pinky Violence. Continuing from the previous work, the main characters are Runa Shimotsuki from 'Undressing Mahjong Battle Royale' and Love Saotome from 'Koakuma Maid, Please from behind'. Directed by Junichi Yamamoto of 'Kuchisake Onna Returns' and 'Magical Michiko'. Many other sexy actresses such as Shijimi and Shiori Tsukada co-star.
title: Gal Bangaichi 2: Let Me Finish It Again
